attributes.action: Implement a new strategy and support package for the UK Nightlife/Music Industry
attributes.additional_details: The UK Nightlife and Music Industry is being simply left to one side and ignored.  Whilst many are demanding action in the form of re-opening clubs and venues, it is apparent that this is some time away yet.  If it is not sensible to open then a support package should be given to venues that are still unable to open.  This support package should be of 3  measures. 1. Security from the threat of winding up. 2. Financial support in the interim. 3. The ability to change their trade temporarily.
attributes.background:
A extension to the Insolvency and Governance Act 2020 for businesses in certain SIC Codes. 
An increased/revised support package to include and extension of the Furlough Scheme.
A review at local authority level to allow changes to current licensing conditions including opening hours for venues.
